com.compendium.io.jabber
Class MeetingReplay

java.lang.Object
  com.compendium.io.jabber.MeetingReplay
All Implemented Interfaces:
BSAuthListener, BSConfListener, BSMessageListener, BSPresenceListener, java.util.EventListener
public class MeetingReplay
extends java.lang.Object
implements BSAuthListener, BSPresenceListener, BSMessageListener, BSConfListener

This class handles the Jabber client side connection for Meeting Replay messaging.

                     java.lang.String sMediaPassword,

Constructor. Creates all the helper bean classes and creates the Meeting Replay JID.

Parameters:
sMediaServer - java.lang.String, the server for the meeting replay tool.
sMediaUserName - java.lang.String, the user name of the account to connect to for Meeting Replay.
thepassword - java.lang.Sting, the password of the account to connect to for MeetingReplay.
theresource - java.lang.String, the resource to use for the Meeting Replay connection.
